author: Larry Paine
text:
Our city is planning to offer online payments for different products--utilities, permits, etc.  Our credit card company is asking for a credit card use policy.  The sample they gave us included a suggested process for returning products ordered which does not apply to local government.
if your processing company requires a similar policy, I would like a copy.
My favorite Tom Peters quote applys here--Wheel not invented here!
Larry Paine
City Administrator
Hillsboro, KS
title: Online Credit Card Policy
